name: wtp-ext
description: Extension for the WebTorrent Protocol distributed web.

scripts.start: cross-env MOZ_DISABLE_CONTENT_SANDBOX=1 web-ext run --firefox=nightly --browser-console --url about:debugging --source-dir extension
scripts.build: cd extension && zip -1 -r ext.zip manifest.json libdweb/src/protocol build && mv ext.zip ../artifacts/

author: Tom Watson <tom@tomjwatson.com>
